Astra: Deep Purple, Gold, Black, Blue colors. Black woman with large braids adorned with golden beads and rings. Golden triangular markings on forehead and cheeks. Most defining feature: solid gold right arm made of cosmic energy (VERY DISTINCTIVE). Dark purple/black attire with golden patterns. Cosmic royalty theme.

MOST DEFINING FEATURE: MASSIVE ROBOTIC PROSTHETIC ARMS - both arms are HUGE titanium metal with glowing orange joints, DISPROPORTIONATELY LARGE compared to body. Dark grey tactical vest with orange highlights. Swedish bionic powerhouse. THE HUGE ROBOT ARMS ARE UNMISTAKABLE.
Brimstone: Army Green, Grey, Orange, Black colors. Older man with grey hair, thick grey mustache and beard. SIGNATURE FEATURE: bright ORANGE BERET on head (military cap). Grey tactical vest over dark shirt, device on left forearm. Veteran American commander look.
Chamber: Navy Blue, Gold, White, Brown colors. Slicked-back brown hair, well-groomed facial hair, STYLISH SQUARE GLASSES on face (VERY DISTINCTIVE), FACE FULLY VISIBLE. Sharp navy blue suit vest over white collared shirt with tie, golden chain on vest. NOT white hat, NOT mask, NOT hidden face, NOT trench coat. Elegant French weapons designer - sophisticated businessman look, GLASSES ALWAYS VISIBLE.
Clove: Pink, Purple, Blue, Black colors. Short wavy PINK HAIR (VERY DISTINCTIVE), youthful face. Asymmetrical outfit: cropped black top, single pink sleeve, glowing pink/blue butterfly motifs. Scottish punk aesthetic with rebellious style.
Cypher: White/Beige, Black, glowing Blue colors. COMPLETELY HIDDEN FACE - black face mask with SINGLE HORIZONTAL glowing blue line across eyes. WHITE FEDORA HAT on top (UNMISTAKABLE COMBO). White/beige trench coat with high collar. NO FACE VISIBLE, NO EYES VISIBLE, NO GLASSES, NO NAVY SUIT. Mysterious Moroccan spy with WHITE HAT - completely concealed identity.
Deadlock: White, Grey, Silver colors. White/platinum blonde hair, pale skin, Norwegian, serious expression. Nanowire/wire theme visible, tactical gear, stern appearance.
Fade: Black, Dark Grey, Teal/Turquoise colors. Long dark hair with grey/white streaks. Heterochromia - one grey/blue eye, one orange/amber eye (DISTINCTIVE). Henna-like markings on hands, dark layered clothing. Turkish bounty hunter, gothic appearance.
Gekko: Bright Green, Beige, Purple, Blue colors. BRIGHT LIME-GREEN HAIR in short spiky cut (VERY DISTINCTIVE), plaster on nose often visible. Beige sleeveless puffer vest over purple t-shirt, small grey beanie. Casual LA streetwear with colorful creature companions.
Harbor: Teal, Cyan, Blue, Black colors. Dark hair tied back, Indian, calm expression. Teal/cyan water theme throughout outfit, bracelet artifact visible. Indian water-themed agent.
Iso: Purple, Black, Dark Grey colors. Dark hair SLICKED BACK with prominent PURPLE STREAK on one side (DISTINCTIVE). HUMAN FACE VISIBLE. Black suit with glowing purple energy lines, flowing dark coat. NOT robot, NOT screen face. Sleek Chinese fixer - fully human agent with purple theme.
Jett: White, Blue, Black colors. Korean woman, SHORT SPIKY WHITE HAIR (VERY DISTINCTIVE). Grey/white bodysuit with blue poncho-like garment flowing over shoulders (looks like clouds/air). Agile wind-based theme.
KAY/O: White, Grey, Black, glowing Blue colors. NO HUMAN FACE - ROBOTIC HEAD with DIGITAL SCREEN showing lines/circles/X pattern (COMPLETELY NON-HUMAN). FULLY MECHANICAL BODY with no organic parts, white/grey armored plates. NOT purple-haired man, NOT human suit. ONLY non-human looking agent - humanoid war machine robot with screen for head.
Killjoy: Bright Yellow, Green, Grey colors. Young woman, dark hair under BRIGHT YELLOW BEANIE (VERY DISTINCTIVE), large round GLASSES. Green cropped puffer jacket over grey shirt. Youthful German engineer, nerdy tech aesthetic.
Neon: Bright Blue, Yellow, Black colors. Filipino woman, BLUE HAIR in TWO HIGH PONYTAILS with YELLOW LIGHTNING-BOLT STREAKS (VERY DISTINCTIVE). Athletic bodysuit with glowing yellow bio-electric lines, face markings that glow. Speed and electricity theme.
Omen: Black, Dark Grey, glowing Purple/Blue colors. NO FACE VISIBLE - dark grey hood and mask with THREE GLOWING HORIZONTAL BLUE/PURPLE SLITS (UNMISTAKABLE). Tattered multi-layered cloak, arms wrapped in bandages. Shadowy spectral phantom entity.
Phoenix: Black, White, Orange/Yellow colors. Young BLACK MALE, dark DREADLOCKS with glowing FIRE-LIKE ORANGE/YELLOW TIPS (DISTINCTIVE). Black bomber jacket with large white Phoenix bird logo on back. NORMAL-SIZED HUMAN ARMS (NOT robot arms, NOT prosthetics). Flashy confident duelist - masculine youthful look with fire theme.
Raze: Orange, Teal, Grey, Green colors. Brazilian FEMALE (woman), dark skin, dreadlocks tied up, ORANGE HEADSET/BEANIE visible. Vibrant engineer with chaotic practical look.
Reyna: Purple, Black, Magenta colors. Mexican woman, long dark hair with GLOWING PURPLE STREAKS, eyes glow purple when abilities active (DISTINCTIVE). Black/purple tactical bodysuit, glowing purple device on chest. Predatory Radiant, intimidating style.
Sage: White, Jade Green, Black colors. Chinese woman, long BLACK HAIR in intricate BUNS/BRAIDS with jade hairpins (DISTINCTIVE). Serene healer, graceful monk-like appearance.
Skye: Green, Brown, Tan, Reddish-brown colors. Muscular woman, REDDISH-BROWN HAIR in side-swept braid. Green crop top with animal-tooth necklaces, wooden trinkets and bracers. Australian naturalist, rugged eco-warrior look.
Sova: Blue, White, Gold, Brown colors. Long BLONDE HAIR, GLOWING BLUE BIONIC RIGHT EYE (DISTINCTIVE). Heavy fur-lined blue/white cloak/poncho over tactical gear, carries bow on back. Russian hunter from frozen tundra.
Viper: Dark Green, Black, glowing Pink/Purple colors. FULL-FACE RESPIRATOR MASK covering entire head - black mask with glowing PINK/PURPLE TRIANGULAR visor (MOST DEFINING FEATURE). Black hair in long thick braid from back of mask. Sleek black/dark green bodysuit. Tall slender chemist - mask is unmistakable.
Vyse: Metallic/Silver colors with rose motifs. Geometric patterns throughout design. Modern metallic aesthetic.
Yoru: Dark Blue, Black, Light Blue colors. Young Japanese man, SPIKY HAIR that's dark blue/black at roots, fades to LIGHT BLUE at tips (TWO-TONED - DISTINCTIVE). Dark blue high-collared jacket with large stylized white/gold ONI MASK graphic on back. Confident dimension-hopping infiltrator.
